mapper.select: SELECT jid, jname, TO_CHAR(jstart, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jstart, TO_CHAR(jend, 'yyyy-mm-dd') jend, required, realstart, realend, content, pid, jstatus FROM jobplan WHERE pid = #{pid} ORDER BY jstart
SELECT m.mid, m.email, m.name, jmid, progress, nvl(jmstatus, ' ') jmstatus, jm.ppid FROM jobmember jm, participants pp, member m WHERE jm.ppid = pp.ppid AND pp.mid = m.mid AND jid = #{jid}
SELECT m.mid, pp.ppid, email, name, pp.pauth FROM participants pp, member m WHERE pp.mid = m.mid AND pid = #{pid} AND exitdate IS NULL
SELECT mid, email, name, auth FROM member WHERE mid NOT IN ( SELECT mid FROM participants WHERE pid = #{pid} AND exitdate IS NULL)
SELECT * FROM project WHERE pid IN (SELECT pid FROM participants WHERE mid = #{mid} AND exitdate IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jobplan(jid, jname, jstart, jend, content, jregdate, juptdate, required, pid) VALUES(jobplan_seq.nextval, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{start}), TO_DATE(#{end}), #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{required}, #{pid})
INSERT INTO participants VALUES(participants_seq.nextval, 'Developer', #{pid}, #{mid}, sysdate, null)
